faciliitiesContent.title: Speech Laboratory
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to practice their public speaking skills.

faciliitiesContent.title: Computer Laboratory
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to practice their computer skills.

faciliitiesContent.title: Bread and Pastry Production Laboratory
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to practice their baking skills.

faciliitiesContent.title: Comupert System Servicing Laboratory
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to practice computer hardware, software, and network troubleshooting.

faciliitiesContent.title: SMAW Metal Fabrication Facility
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to practice in cutting, joining, and shaping metal with industry-grade tools

faciliitiesContent.title: Driving and Maintenance Facility
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to practice safe driving and basic vehicle care using real-world setups

faciliitiesContent.title: Female Comfort Room
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to relax and unwind.

faciliitiesContent.title: Male Comfort Room
faciliitiesContent.description: A space for students to relax and unwind.

callToActionContent.heading: Ready to Join Our Community?
callToActionContent.description: We invite you to take the next step in providing your child with an exceptional Catholic education. Contact our Admissions Office to schedule a tour or apply today.
